alert.note: Alert for Pueblo (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 16 at 8:10PM MDT until June 20 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Colorado... Arkansas River NEAR Avondale affecting Pueblo County. For the Lower Arkansas River...including Avondale...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Arkansas River NEAR Avondale. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Minor Flood. Minor lowland flooding occurs near Avondale * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM MDT Friday the stage was 5.6 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise to 6.6 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall to 6.5 feet Sunday evening. It will rise above flood stage early Monday morning to 7.1 feet Monday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Monday afternoon. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 7.8 feet on 04/24/1942. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 815 AM MDT.
